original_text: And he discovered the covering of Judah, and thou didst look in that day to the armour of the house of the forest.
korean_text: 그가 유다에게 덮였던 것을 벗기매 그 날에야 네가 수풀 곳간의 병기를 바라보았고

sentences.original_text: And he discovered the covering of Judah
and thou didst look in that day
to the armour of the house of the forest
